skills.title: Cornell Blockchain
skills.description: Engaged in comprehensive Web3 and Blockchain Technology workshops to understand emerging technologies. Collaborated with influential figures like NBA Nets owner Clara Wu and NYC Mayor Eric Adams, sharing insights gained from the workshops with group members.

skills.title: BK INTERNATIONAL EDUCATION CONSULTANCY
skills.description: Revitalized social media engagement by 20%+, crafted compelling infographics, enhanced learning through video editing, expanded network with 30+ experts, optimized website speed by over 30% using HTML and CSS, and improved mobile app UX using HTML CSS and JS.

skills.title: UPROSE
